_header: Come Shaper Holy Ghost offset our thoughts
Subjects: Holy Ghost, hymns to; hymns, to Holy Ghost
_description: William Herebert, ‘Veni Creator Spiritus’ — seven couplets

BLAdd46919.First Lines: Com shuppere holy gost ofseth oure þouhtesvul wyth grace of heuene heortes þat þou wrouhtestVeni creator…
BLAdd46919.Last Lines: …Woele to þe uader and to þe sone þat vrom deth arosAnd also to þes holy gos euer ay boe worshipe and losGloria patri
BLAdd46919.Attributed Author: Herebert (in left margin beside first line, f. 207v)
BLAdd46919.Attributed Title: Veni creator spiritus & cetera (above text, f. 207v)
